title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.1 - Violation officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.1 - Violation officer

State Regulations
(a) There
shall be in each correctional facility one or more officers of the rank of
sergeant or above who shall function as a violation officer, the number to be
dependent upon the needs of the facility. (b) The violation officer shall be
responsible for conducting the violation hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
252.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
